lead_paragraph: BERKE--Arnold, born November 15, 1923, died April 27, 2014 in Redding, CT. Son of the late George and Ella Berkowitz. Survived by his wife Marjorie; children George, Gregory and Debbie (Fitts); granddaughter Lyndsey Fitts and sister Regina Brauer and children. His spirit sails free on gentle wind. Service Saturday, May 3, 2014, 4:30pm, Unitarian Church of Westport, CT.
